mapper.update: update question_dot set question_id = #{questionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dot_id = #{dotId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, c_time = #{cTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, m_time = #{mTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, question_id, company_id, area_id, dot_id, c_time, m_time from question_dot
